bibl.title: A Chronology for Agricola, Mons Graupius and Domitian's Triumph in the Chattan War.
bibl.note: See in part. pp. 163-166: Domitian Germanicus - the Epigraphic [and Papyrological] Evidence. Domitian's title Germanicus was not awarded by the Senate until November or December 83. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Ian Gordon Smith, A Chronology for Agricola, Mons Graupius and Domitian's Triumph in the Chattan War.

See in part. pp. 163-166: Domitian Germanicus - the Epigraphic [and Papyrological] Evidence. Domitian's title Germanicus was not awarded by the Senate until November or December 83. - Avec résumé en anglais.
